sentence.Network_en: Fusions were common between strains from deciduous hosts or coniferous hosts.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自阔叶树或针叶树寄生的菌系间融合是普遍的.

sentence.Network_en: In Belarus side, 88 % of the trees are coniferous and mixed forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 在白俄罗斯一侧, 树木88%是针叶和针阔叶混交林.

sentence.Network_en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to make coniferous or deciduous.
sentence.Network_cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击,使之成为针叶树或落叶树.

entry.def: A  coniferous forest or wood is made up of conifers.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or part of trees or shrubs bearing cones and evergreen leaves
